info.title: EncoderCloud API
info.description: EncoderCloud offers a flexible API for seamlessly integrating our cloud based transcoding services directly into your own applications.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to be performed. Action values will be listed below next to the available requests.

parameters.name: formats[destination]
parameters.description: Destination URL to upload encoded file

parameters.name: formats[profile_id]
parameters.description: Profile ID to use for encoding.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: Job ID assigned by EncoderCloud at the time new video request was made.

parameters.name: postback
parameters.description: HTTP(S) URL of the script the result would be posted to.
